game.title: The Lost Temple of Eldarath
game.objective: Find the ancient scrolls within the Lost Temple of Eldarath.
game.description: Rumors have been circulating about a hidden temple deep in the forest, containing ancient scrolls with powerful knowledge. The village elder has asked for your assistance in retrieving these scrolls.
game.reward: A magical amulet granting resistance to elemental attacks

task.objective: Reach the entrance of the Lost Temple of Eldarath.
task.description: Follow the winding path through the forest until you reach a large stone structure hidden behind the foliage.
task.location: The entrance is located at the heart of the Whispering Woods, approximately 3 miles east of Oakwood Village.

task.objective: Navigate through the temple's traps and puzzles to reach the inner sanctum.
task.description: Solve a series of ancient riddles and avoid deadly traps set by the temple's long-forgotten builders.
task.location: Inside the Lost Temple of Eldarath, accessible only after reaching the entrance.

task.objective: Raise the ancient artifact and claim the scrolls.
task.description: Use your wits to unlock the mechanism that seals the artifact's resting place, then carefully raise it to claim the scrolls.
task.location: The inner sanctum of the Lost Temple of Eldarath, accessible only after solving the puzzles and traps.
